title: Houkago Bitchcraft
original_name: 放課後ビッチクラフト
sinopse:
When the Chemistry teacher secretly practices witchcraft at normal school, many things can go wrong! Fuyumi Renji realizes this as Kirise Ririka somehow walks through all his magic barriers and interrupts his spellcasting! How could a normal high school girl ever be able to do this?

(Source: MU)
